117.movie_plot: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

172.movie_plot: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

147.movie_name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999)
147.movie_plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

220.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

284.movie_plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

49.movie_plot: An all-out war looms when the discovery of a cure for mutations draws a line between the followers of Charles Xavier and those of Magneto.

318.movie_plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

223.movie_plot: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther, Bagheera, and free spirited bear, Baloo.

92.movie_plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

341.movie_plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

31.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
31.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

122.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

28.movie_plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

160.movie_plot: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

235.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

262.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

250.movie_plot: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

201.movie_plot: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

66.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

69.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

263.movie_plot: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

257.movie_plot: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

325.movie_plot: Kermit and his friends go to New York to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

180.movie_plot: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

207.movie_plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

21.movie_plot: Wallace falls for Wendolene, a wool shop owner, while Gromit is framed for the sheep rustling.

139.movie_name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997)
139.movie_plot: Two dim-witted, inseparable friends hit the road for their ten-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

345.movie_plot: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken control of a New York media mogul's high-tech skyscraper.

112.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

196.movie_plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

194.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

76.movie_plot: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

209.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

317.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

322.movie_plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.

4.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

58.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

327.movie_plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

162.movie_plot: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

304.movie_name: I Know What You Did Last Summer (1997)
304.movie_plot: After a nasty accident, four friends begin to drift apart. One year later Julie James gets a anonymous message and then a slicker wearing, hook wielding killer begins to rip apart her life.

208.movie_plot: A temperamental figure skater and a former hockey player try to win Olympic gold as a figure skating pairs team.

202.movie_plot: Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.

135.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

211.movie_name: Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear, The (1991)
211.movie_plot: Lieutenant Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

186.movie_plot: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine - the Mob - track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

306.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

164.movie_plot: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

231.movie_plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

193.movie_plot: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

64.movie_plot: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

167.movie_plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

104.movie_plot: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

251.movie_plot: A spoof of Robin Hood in general and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

213.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

214.movie_plot: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

238.movie_plot: When a recently-deceased ghost couple find their now-vacant home invaded by an obnoxious family, they hire a sleazy ghost who gets rid of humans to help them.

278.movie_name: Kids in the Hall: Brain Candy (1996)
278.movie_plot: A pharmaceutical scientist creates a pill that makes people remember their happiest memory, and although it's successful, it has unfortunate side effects.

292.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

319.movie_plot: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

93.movie_plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

344.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

127.movie_plot: Film about filmmaking. It takes place during one day on set of non-budget movie. Ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers.

3.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

289.movie_plot: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

192.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

256.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

134.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

124.movie_plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

146.movie_plot: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

281.movie_plot: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

24.movie_plot: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

205.movie_plot: Wallace takes a break from trying to decide on a holiday destination only to find he has no cheese for his crackers. The solution to both problems is a trip to the moon, with dog Gromit, because everybody knows the moon's made of cheese.

182.movie_plot: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

267.movie_plot: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

271.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

163.movie_plot: When a girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

315.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

116.movie_name: All About My Mother (Todo Sobre Mi Madre) (1999)
116.movie_plot: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

12.movie_plot: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

63.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

158.movie_plot: A professional hitman and hitwoman fall in love.

165.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

221.movie_plot: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

179.movie_name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (1997)
179.movie_plot: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

118.movie_plot: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

226.movie_plot: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

99.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

265.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
265.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

173.movie_plot: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

144.movie_plot: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

280.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

22.movie_plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

148.movie_plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

242.movie_plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

198.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

109.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

296.movie_plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

331.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

247.movie_plot: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

229.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
229.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

9.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

308.movie_plot: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

131.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

52.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

151.movie_plot: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

16.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

174.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

14.movie_plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

219.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

312.movie_plot: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery.

234.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

81.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

222.movie_plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

85.movie_name: Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!, The (1988)
85.movie_plot: Incompetent police detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

83.movie_plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

62.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

23.movie_plot: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

255.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

115.movie_plot: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

46.movie_plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

329.movie_plot: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. Agent, whose lover he killed.

105.movie_plot: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

178.movie_plot: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

273.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

310.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

18.movie_plot: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

19.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

123.movie_plot: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

286.movie_plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

268.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

300.movie_plot: A true story of politics and art in the 1930s U.S., focusing on a leftist musical drama and attempts to stop its production.

190.movie_plot: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

5.movie_plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

128.movie_plot: Henry, a drifter, commits a series of brutal murders, supposedly operating with impunity.

187.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

102.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

42.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
42.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

65.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

111.movie_plot: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

295.movie_plot: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

143.movie_plot: An aspiring director and the marginally talented amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

336.movie_plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

13.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

343.movie_plot: An LA detective is murdered because she has microfilm with the recipe to make cocaine cookies. A "Lethal Weapon" style cop team tries to find and stop the fiends before they can dope the ...

119.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

252.movie_plot: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter Patch Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

203.movie_plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

270.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

82.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

288.movie_plot: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

299.movie_plot: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

339.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

171.movie_plot: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

305.movie_plot: A group of twenty-something friends, most of whom live in the same apartment complex, search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

153.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

333.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

48.movie_plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

342.movie_plot: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

237.movie_plot: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

114.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

324.movie_plot: Kermit, Gonzo and Fozzie are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

197.movie_plot: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

149.movie_plot: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

154.movie_plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

61.movie_plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during the First World War and then the October Revolution.

145.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

228.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

72.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

56.movie_plot: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

132.movie_plot: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

6.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

138.movie_plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home cause confusion.

43.movie_plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

45.movie_plot: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

78.movie_plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

96.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
96.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

35.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

10.movie_plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

293.movie_plot: Simon Templar (The Saint), is a thief for hire, whose latest job to steal the secret process for cold fusion puts him at odds with a traitor bent on toppling the Russian government, as well as the woman who holds its secret.

77.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

294.movie_plot: Planet Spaceballs' President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

88.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
88.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

298.movie_plot: After being hypnotized by his sister in law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

175.movie_plot: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

1.movie_plot: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

225.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

326.movie_plot: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

29.movie_plot: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

25.movie_plot: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

287.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

269.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

87.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

227.movie_plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

210.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

120.movie_plot: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

290.movie_plot: A successful veternarian & radio show host with low self-esteem asks her model friend to impersonate her when a handsome man wants to see her.

328.movie_plot: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

113.movie_plot: Documentary following singer Madonna on her controversial Blond Ambition tour in 1990.

130.movie_plot: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

37.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

98.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

189.movie_plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

156.movie_plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

184.movie_plot: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

233.movie_plot: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

30.movie_plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

51.movie_plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

95.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
95.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

60.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

108.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

54.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

159.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

32.movie_plot: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

188.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)
188.movie_plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

244.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

89.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

253.movie_plot: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

311.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

71.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

240.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
240.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

320.movie_plot: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

166.movie_plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

337.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.
